languages.text: {n}Вас окружают мертвецы — множество трупов, изуродованных тел и их фрагментов. Люди, друкари и иные, совсем незнакомые вам ксеносы — все недвижимо лежат в этом мрачном мортарии.{/n}
{n}You are surrounded by the dead — numerous corpses, mutilated bodies and pieces thereof. Humans, Drukhari, and other xenos unfamiliar to you lie motionless in this gruesome mortuary.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вас окружают мертвецы — множество трупов, изуродованных тел и их фрагментов. Люди, друкари и иные, совсем незнакомые вам ксеносы — все недвижимо лежат в этом мрачном мортарии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You are surrounded by the dead — plenty of corpses, mutilated bodies and their fragments. Humans, Drukhari and other xenos unfamiliar to you lie motionless in this gruesome mortuary.{/n}
{n}You are surrounded by the dead — plenty of corpses, mutilated bodies and their fragments. Humans, Drukhari and other xenos unfamiliar to you lie motionless in this gruesome mortuary.{/n}
{n}You are surrounded by the dead — numerous corpses, mutilated bodies and pieces thereof. Humans, Drukhari, and other xenos unfamiliar to you lie motionless in this gruesome mortuary.{/n}
{n}You are surrounded by the dead — numerous corpses, mutilated bodies and pieces thereof. Humans, Drukhari, and other xenos unfamiliar to you lie motionless in this gruesome mortuary.{/n}
{n}You are surrounded by the dead — numerous corpses, mutilated bodies and pieces thereof. Humans, Drukhari, and other xenos unfamiliar to you lie motionless in this gruesome mortuary.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你周围到处都是堆积如山的尸体，有的尸体遭到了肢解，还有的则被撕成了碎片。无数人类与黑暗灵族的尸体，与其他你并不熟悉的异形尸体，一动不动地堆积在这间恐怖的停尸房内。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are surrounded by the dead — numerous corpses, mutilated bodies and pieces thereof. Humans, Drukhari, and other xenos unfamiliar to you lie motionless in this gruesome mortuary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你周围到处都是堆积如山的尸体，有的尸体遭到了肢解，还有的则被撕成了碎片。无数人类与黑暗灵族的尸体，与其他你并不熟悉的异形尸体，一动不动地堆积在这间恐怖的停尸房内。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あたりは死体だらけだ――複数の死体やバラバラに切断された身体があちこちにある。人間、デュカーリ、見たことのない異種族などが、おぞましい死体安置所で身動きせずに横たわっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are surrounded by the dead — numerous corpses, mutilated bodies and pieces thereof. Humans, Drukhari, and other xenos unfamiliar to you lie motionless in this gruesome mortuary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あたりは死体だらけだ――複数の死体やバラバラに切断された身体があちこちにある。人間、デュカーリ、見たことのない異種族などが、おぞましい死体安置所で身動きせずに横たわっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los muertos te rodean: una gran cantidad de cadáveres, cuerpos mutilados y extremidades. Humanos, Drukhari y otros xenos que no reconoces permanecen inmóviles en esta espantosa necrópolis.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are surrounded by the dead — numerous corpses, mutilated bodies and pieces thereof. Humans, Drukhari, and other xenos unfamiliar to you lie motionless in this gruesome mortuary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los muertos te rodean: una gran cantidad de cadáveres, cuerpos mutilados y extremidades. Humanos, Drukhari y otros xenos que no reconoces permanecen inmóviles en esta espantosa necrópolis.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|entouré|entourée} de nombreux cadavres mutilés, dont certains sont même en morceaux. Dans cette morgue répugnante gisent aussi bien des humains que des Drukharis et d'autres xénos que vous ne reconnaissez pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are surrounded by the dead — numerous corpses, mutilated bodies and pieces thereof. Humans, Drukhari, and other xenos unfamiliar to you lie motionless in this gruesome mortuary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|entouré|entourée} de nombreux cadavres mutilés, dont certains sont même en morceaux. Dans cette morgue répugnante gisent aussi bien des humains que des Drukharis et d'autres xénos que vous ne reconnaissez pas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bist von Toten umgeben – zahlreiche Leichen, verstümmelte Körper und Einzelteile. In diesem grausen Totenhaus liegen Menschen, Drukhari und andere dir nicht bekannte Xenos bewegungslos nebeneinander.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are surrounded by the dead — numerous corpses, mutilated bodies and pieces thereof. Humans, Drukhari, and other xenos unfamiliar to you lie motionless in this gruesome mortuary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bist von Toten umgeben – zahlreiche Leichen, verstümmelte Körper und Einzelteile. In diesem grausen Totenhaus liegen Menschen, Drukhari und andere dir nicht bekannte Xenos bewegungslos nebeneinander.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çevren ölülerle, bedenleri biçimsizleştirilmiş ve parçalara ayrılmış sayısız cesetle dolu. İnsanlar, Drukhariler ve sana tanıdık gelmeyen farklı zenolar... Bu dehşet verici morgda hareketsizce yatıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are surrounded by the dead — numerous corpses, mutilated bodies and pieces thereof. Humans, Drukhari, and other xenos unfamiliar to you lie motionless in this gruesome mortuary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Çevren ölülerle sarılı. Bedenleri biçimsizleştirilmiş ve parçalara ayrılmış sayısız ceset var. İnsanlar, Drukhariler ve sana tanıdık gelmeyen farklı zenolar, bu dehşet verici morgda hareketsizce yatıyor.{/n}
